physicalCharacteristics.spread: Expected width or spread of the plant/tree.
physicalCharacteristics.growthRate: Speed at which the plant/tree grows.
physicalCharacteristics.matureHeight: Expected height when the plant/tree is fully grown
physicalCharacteristics.matureSpread: Expected spread when the plant/tree is fully grown.
physicalCharacteristics.PlantingZone: USDA hardiness zone or other relevant planting zone information.

careInformation.watering_requirements: Information on how often and how much to water the plant/tree.
careInformation.sunlight_requirements: Preferred amount of sunlight (e.g., full sun, partial shade, full shade).
careInformation.soil_type: Preferred soil type (e.g., sandy, loamy, clay).
careInformation.pests_and_diseases: Common pests and diseases affecting the plant/tree and their treatments.

additionalInformation.origin: Native region or country of the plant/tree.
additionalInformation.seasonality: Best planting season and flowering/fruiting season.
additionalInformation.hardiness: Information on how well the plant/tree can withstand cold or heat.
additionalInformation.toxicity: Information on whether the plant/tree is toxic to humans or pets.
additionalInformation.uses: Common uses (e.g., ornamental, fruit production, shade, medicinal)

Name: Green Succulent in Teal Ceramic Vase
description: A beautiful green succulent planted in a stylish teal ceramic vase, perfect for adding a touch of nature to any space.

careInformation.watering_requirements: Water sparingly, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings.
careInformation.sunlight_requirements: Prefers bright, indirect light. Can tolerate some direct sunlight.
careInformation.soil_type: Well-draining cactus or succulent soil mix.
careInformation.fertilization: Fertilize lightly once a month during the growing season (spring and summer).
careInformation.pruning: Minimal pruning required; remove dead or yellowing leaves as needed.
careInformation.pests_and_diseases: Susceptible to mealybugs and root rot. Ensure good air circulation and avoid overwatering.

additionalInformation.origin: Native to arid regions of North America.
additionalInformation.seasonality: Can be planted year-round indoors; may produce small flowers in spring.
additionalInformation.hardiness: Hardy to temperatures above 50Â°F; protect from frost.
additionalInformation.uses: Ideal as a decorative accent for home or office spaces.
